elements.name: 1. To verify successfull login and invalid login

steps.name: User select the Chrome browser
User loads trademe home url in the selected browser
navigate to the login page
User enters gineshthomas@gmail.com and test1234*
User enter CAPTCHA and then click login button
User is successfully logged-In
User close the browser

elements.name: 1. To verify successfull login and invalid login

steps.name: User select the Chrome browser
User loads trademe home url in the selected browser
navigate to the login page
User enters invalid@email.comm and 122325
User enter CAPTCHA and then click login button
User is successfully logged-In
User close the browser

name: To test the login functionalities of TradeMe application
